issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Remove images error message should be improved

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I tried to deregister a used linux image:

# euca-deregister emi-23E042C9
DeregisterImageType: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.images.BlockStorageImageInfo#8a949e8c3b6b1bc1013b8f7c377403ab]

The given error message is quite useless even for eucalyptus administrators. In the logs I found this:

Thu Dec 13 13:50:13 2012  WARN [org.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter.logExceptions(JDBCExceptionReporter.java):100] SQL Error: 0, SQLState: 23503
Thu Dec 13 13:50:13 2012 ERROR [org.hibernate.util.JDBCExceptionReporter.logExceptions(JDBCExceptionReporter.java):101] ERROR: update or delete on table "metadata_images" violates foreign key constraint "fkf1c9856e63e1b9fd" on table "metadata_instances"
  Detail: Key (id)=(8a949e8c3b6b1bc1013b8f7c377403ab) is still referenced from table "metadata_instances".
Thu Dec 13 13:50:13 2012 ERROR [org.hibernate.event.def.AbstractFlushingEventListener.performExecutions(AbstractFlushingEventListener.java):324] Could not synchronize database state with session

********************************************************************************

The foreign key violation of table metadata_instances gave me the hint to look into my current running instances and there I found one still using the image I want to deregister.

So the error message should just tell me, that there a still running instances using the image. Even more helpful would be to list the instance identifier that are using the image.
fields.summary: Error message should be improved when trying to delete a used image

comments.body: I'm resolving this issue as a duplicate of EUCA-1800 .  Please watch that issue for updates.  Thanks.
